<Text: The Grand Bleu de Gascogne (FCI No.22) is a breed of dog of the scenthound type, originating in France and used for hunting in packs.>
<Triplets:<The Grand Bleu de Gascogne
1:
--------------------
Text: Grand Bleu de Gascogne:  Today's breed is the descendant of a very old type of large hunting dog, and is an important breed in the ancestry of many other hounds.
